title: Egyptian Koshary
ingredients: Black lentils, rice, pasta, tomato sauce, fried onions
instructions: Boil lentils and rice, prepare the sauce, fry the onions, and combine everything.

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, basil
instructions: Roll out the dough, add sauce and cheese, then bake.

title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Boil all ingredients, blend them, and serve hot.

title: Chicken Kabsa
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken, kabsa spices, tomato, onion
instructions: Sear the chicken, add ingredients, and cook the rice with them.

title: Chocolate Croissant
instructions: Wrap the chocolate in dough and bake.

title: Fattoush Salad
ingredients: Lettuce, cucumber, tomato, radish, green onion, toasted bread, lemon juice, olive oil
instructions: Chop the veggies and mix with bread, lemon juice, and olive oil.

title: Indian Kebab
ingredients: Minced meat, Indian spices, onion, bell pepper, skewers
instructions: Mix meat with spices and onion, shape on skewers, and grill.

title: Grilled Fish
ingredients: Fish, lemon, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper
instructions: Marinate the fish with lemon and garlic, then grill.

title: Basbousa
instructions: Mix ingredients and bake until golden.
